data.message: Eminem hello, my name is mohamed balla traore i'm from guinea conakry i'm fatherless and i'm poor all my family is againss my problem is eminem i wanna going to american juste to look eminem and touch eminem before die but i don't have money to going please help me i wanna assistate yr the party of yr new album , eminem i starter to listen yr music since 2004 wen i whas 14 years until present i continue ton listen yr music, you'r my best and celebrate 00224656066254/ 00224620626468
